outputs.output_descr: This project aims to assist Sudan with the enabling activities necessary to prepare and report the Second National Communication to the Conference of Parties in accordance with guidance of the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) and in the long tern, to strengthen Sudan's capacity to fulfill its commitments to the UNFCCC on a continuing basis.

project_descr: Prepartion of the Second National Communication on Climate Change to the UNFCCC (PIMs 3592 CC EN)
project_title: Second National Commuication Report on CC
